name: ...Not Even Yourself
description:
This is the latest version of ...Not Even Yourself. This game was originally created for BenBonk Game Jam #1. If you want to play the version originally submitted, please download the original version below or go to https://hacktic.itch.io/not-even-yourself.

You are the sentinel, entrusted with guarding the world orb for all eternity. However, you are constantly being sabotaged by your shadow form, who tries to destroy the orb when you rest. 

_____________________________________

Collect resources and craft defences to keep out the enemies. However, be careful not to make the defences too difficult, as on alternate rounds you must get past your own defences and destroy the orb. You can shoot and destroy your own turrets, but be careful not to make your defences too weak!

____________________________________

Controls:

Esc - Pause game

Defence Mode

E - Toggle craft and place mode

Scroll Wheel - Select item to place

Left Click - craft item/place item

Attack Mode

Left Click - Shoot

____________________________________

Made by Team Hacktic in three days for Benbonk Game Jam #1

Source code: https://github.com/matthew-bvrn/Trust-No-One-Not-Even-Yourself

If you enjoy this game and would like to see us expand it, or you find the source code helpful, please consider donating.
